title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5903.7 - Grant agreement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5903.7 - Grant agreement

State Regulations
A grant agreement shall be executed between the foundation
and the applicant. The foundation shall require that: (a) periodic progress reports shall be
submitted to the foundation; (b) periodic financial reports shall be submitted to the foundation, including
reports concerning the equivalent expenditure of matching funds, where
applicable; and
(c) provision be
made for site visits by foundation staff (and/or appropriate consultants) to
review progress of the project. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5903.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
